info.title: Fixed Asset â€“ Post Asset Acquisition
info.description: This service contains the nodes required for acquisition postings. These include the following nodes: posting date, ledger, valuation, and posting amount.

x-sap-shortText: Make postings for asset acquisitions, post-capitalizations, credit memos, and quantity adjustments using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: [Asset Accounting - Group Ledger IFRS(1GB)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/1GB " Link To BP ")
